description:
Description
Number of prostate cancer deaths and midperiod population for nonwhites in the USA by age and period.
The cohort index k is related to age and period indices (i and j, respectively) by k = j + I - i, 
where I = max(i) (Holford, 1983, Table 2).
title: Age, Period and Cohort Effects for Vital Rates

parameters.y: Numeric: the number of prostate cancer deaths.

format: A data frame with 49 observations on the following 4 variables.
